pages.title: Angelic Imitator
pages.text: With $(thing)Mana$() injected into your veins, you should be ready to start slinging spells around right?$(br)...$(br)Wrong! That $(thing)Mana$() is limited, and if you aren't careful you can easily end up injuring yourself. It's much easier to avoid this mistake if you are actually aware of how much $(thing)Mana$() is left in your body.
This can be done with a $(item)Crude Halo$() - A poor, yet sufficient, imitation of those worn by the Angels.
